FuncDef: This command defines how the BGP will treat a received EVPN route without RC5512 BGP encapsulation extended community. If no encapsulation is received, BGP will validate the route as MPLS or VXLAN depending on how this command is configured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that mpls is the default encapsulation value in the case where no RFC5512 extended community is received in the incoming BGP-EVPN route.
Specifies that vxlan is the default encapsulation value.
